Projects.title: Dashboard Ekraf
desc: Architected and developed the backend system for a digital platform to support creative economy actors, focusing on a custom questionnaire and data recapitulation module.
Implemented a secure RESTful API using AdonisJS and designed a normalized PostgreSQL schema, which automated data processing and improved data accuracy for stakeholders.

Projects.title: Sincosmile
desc: Architected and developed the platform's core features, including the automated scoring engine and a Role-Based Access Control system to manage user permissions.

Leveraged Supabase as a Backend-as-a-Service to accelerate development, and optimized PostgreSQL queries, resulting in a significant improvement in data retrieval efficiency for the assessment feature.

Projects.title: Mother Apps
desc: Architected and developed the entire end-to-end system, featuring a cross-platform mobile application in Flutter and a robust RESTful API in Laravel.
Engineered a custom business logic engine on the backend for dynamic calorie calculation and exercise tracking, tailored to individual user health conditions to ensure data accuracy and safety.

Projects.title: Denkmeister
desc: Developed a cross-platform mobile application from concept to completion using Flutter, focusing on an offline-first architecture to ensure seamless user access without an internet connection.
Implemented an efficient local data structure using JSON Assets and managed the application's state with Provider resulting in a responsive and stable user experience.

Projects.title: Neurehab
desc: Develop integrated system combining an immersive Virtual Reality (VR) simulation, an IoT-enabled exoskeleton, and a Kotlin-based mobile app for patient monitoring.

Engineered the communication protocol between Unity 3D, Arduino microcontrollers, and the mobile app to create a low-latency, real-time feedback loop, enabling accurate monitoring and gamified physical therapy.

Projects.title: BUNYA: Buat Senyawa
desc: BUNYA is an award-winning educational game. As a 3rd Place Winner at the Electrical & Informatics Engineering Student Research Festival held by Universitas Negeri Malang, this project teaches players about chemical elements, compounds, and laboratory equipment by blending engaging fantasy elements with real-world scientific principles.

Projects.title: Credit Risk Prediction & Scoring System
desc: Developed an end-to-end machine learning model to predict credit risk, achieving 85% accuracy in identifying high-risk loan applications.
Engineered predictive features from historical lending data and utilized XGBoost and Scikit-learn to build and evaluate the classification model, forming the core of the scoring system.

Projects.title: RumahSaladFaqiha: MSME F&B Information System
desc: Designed and developed a web application to digitize core business operations such as order management, customer data and inventory tracking. resulting in productivity boost for the business owner.

Projects.title: JelajahNusantara
desc: An immersive educational platform celebrating Indonesian cultural heritage.
Developed with Laravel, featuring interactive elements and rich content delivery for an engaging user experience in cultural learning.
